instance.context:
He stalled for a half-hour longer , hoping to hear something from Vecchio about the ransom_money . Bake and Shirl_Winter , on separate telephones , could not reach him at any conceivable location in Los_Angeles , nor could they secure any clear-cut information regarding his efforts . Bake cursed . `` The sweaty bastard 's probably halfway to
Peru with our money by now '' . When no one smiled , he felt constrained to add , `` Just kidding , natch '' . Thornburg popped_in to advise , `` Andy , Skolman 's sending_up_smoke_signals . You about ready '' ?
